pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
